FuncDef:
The traffic-policy network inbound applies a traffic policy to an EVPN instance.
The undo traffic-policy network inbound command cancels the configuration.
By default, a traffic policy is not applied to an EVPN instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Applies a traffic policy to an EVPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To apply a traffic policy to an EVPN instance to match the upstream public-network-side traffic on the tunnel egress PE, run the traffic-policy network inbound command.
Prerequisites
The bd-evpn-instance view has been displayed using the evpn vpn-instance bd-mode command.
Precautions
The EVPN ACL does not support redirection, URPF, forwarding action priority adjustment, syslog, sampling, or load balancing. If any of these actions is configured in a traffic behavior of a traffic policy, this traffic policy cannot be applied to the bd-evpn-instance view.
